snippet: Several apps can help you unearth your relatives, using an assortment of databases.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column notes mobile apps that can help trace ancestry with genealogy research, using an assortment of databases.
lead_paragraph: Several apps can help you unearth your relatives, using an assortment of databases.
